trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for collecting layout scheme characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 提供基类以收集布局方案特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class is the base class for types that collect the various characteristics common to a specific user interface (UI) layout scheme, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>类是通用的各种特性收集到一个特定的用户界面 (UI) 布局方案，如的类型的基类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> object for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 实现自定义 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current table layout engine.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A> property is typically used in two contexts: the container that uses a layout scheme, and the child control of the container to which the layout scheme is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A>属性一般用于在两个上下文： 容器，使用布局方案中，并向其应用的布局方案的容器的子控件。
